headline: EOG Resources to Present at Upcoming Conference
summary: EOG Resources, Inc. (NYSE: EOG) (EOG) is scheduled to present at the Goldman Sachs Energy, CleanTech and Utilities Conference at 9:15 a.m. Central time (10:15 a.m. Eastern time) on Wednesday, January 7. Ann Janssen, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, will present on behalf of EOG.

headline: Tracking Bruce Berkowitz's Fairholme Portfolio - Q3 2025 Update

headline: I Think Investors Are Missing The Best Energy Trade For 2026
summary: I expect a special segment within energy to deliver substantial alpha in 2026 and beyond, surpassing traditional sector returns. Read the full analysis here.
